entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
